ud5.2:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
ud5.2:1.3: Atha kho ayasma anando sayanhasamayam patisallana vutthito yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
ud5.2:1.5: Yava appayuka hi, bhante, bhagavato mata ahosi, sattahajate bhagavati bhagavato mata kalamakasi, tusitam kayam upapajji”ti.
ud5.2:2.1: “Evametam, ananda, appayuka hi, ananda, bodhisattamataro honti.
ud5.2:2.2: Sattahajatesu bodhisattesu bodhisattamataro kalam karonti, tusitam kayam upapajjanti”ti.
ud5.2:3.1: Atha kho bhagava etamattham viditva tayam velayam imam udanam udanesi:
